title: Neruppu Koothadikkuthu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai
stanzas:
ye urakkam enna koothukattu
oththayila koothukattu
hey uzhaichathelaam podhumada
vidiya vidiya koothukattu

innaikku mudinji pochu
eduthu mootta kattu
raathiri irukkuthadaa
roundaa koothukattu .
koothukattey...

thunbam indha thunbam
idhu manitharodu piranthadhu
un kaiyyil regai pola
azhiyaamal kooda varuvadhu

idhai enni sogam endraal
ada naamum endru sirippathu
idhu endrum mudiyaadhu
nam kadaisi moochil kalanthadhu

maram sedi kodiyum kooda
puyalil odanji kedakkuthu
marunadi thunbam marandhu
thala thookki sirikkuthu

innaikku mudinji pochu
eduthu mootta kattu
raathiri irukkuthadaa
roundaa koothukattu .

un kannil eeram kanden
en manathil engo valikkudhu
mugam saaya vizhi mooda
indha naban tholgal irukkudhu

indha vaanam adhu vanthu
unnai punnagaikka kenjuthu
atharkkaaga antha vinnil
adhu vedikkaigal kaatudhu

soththam paththum serthavanu
pogaiyaathaan poguraan
sogathula sirippavanthaan
sugamaaga vazhuraan

ye urakkam enna koothukattu
oththayila koothukattu
hey uzhaichathelaam podhumada
vidiya vidiya koothukattu

innaikku mudinji pochu
eduthu mootta kattu
raathiri irukkuthadaa
roundaa koothukattu .
koothukattey...

seo.description: Get the complete Neruppu Koothadikkuthu Song Lyrics Thulluvadho Ilamai from Thulluvadho Ilamai. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Chithra Sivaraman. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Thulluvadho Ilamai, Yuvan, Chithra Sivaraman, Venkat Prabhu, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
